desc.p: This field allows multiple field values in APP.VALUE to be delimited by this character.
Can only be , . * or /
Must be entered if APP.APPLI is entered.
A multi-value field associated with TAX.START.DATE. The value could be 'SOURCE' if the tax is to be deducted by the depository or 'LOCAL' if the tax is to be deducted by the bank.
Either 'SOURCE' or 'LOCAL'
Mandatory Input
A multi value field associated with SRC.LCL.TAX. This field indicates the date from which the associated tax is applicable.
Standard date format.
A null value is only used as a first multi-value of this field and this should occur only once.
Any dates entered into the multi-value set should be in ascending order.
The description of the capital gains tax condition. A multi-language field.
Allows alpha-numeric input. Only the following characters will be accepted 'A to Z', 'a to z', '0 to 9', space or '!"#$%&'()*+,-./[\]:;<=>?@^'
A multi value field associated with SRC.LCL.TAX. This field indicates the date from which the associated tax is applicable.
Standard date format.
A null value is only used as a first multi-value of this field and this should occur only once.
Any dates entered into the multi-value set should be in ascending order.
This field allows the user to specify which applications are to be used as the selection criteria when deciding whether the parameter condition applies.
Can only be CUSTOMER, SECURITY.MASTER, SUB.ASSET.TYPE or SEC.ACC.MASTER
Optional Input
This field allows the user to specify which fields are to be used as the selection criteria when deciding whether the parameter condition applies.
The field name must exist in the applications STANDARD.SELECTION record.
Must be entered if APP.APPLI is entered.
This field allows the user to specify which field operations are to be used as the selection criteria when deciding whether the parameter condition applies.
Can only be EQ, NE, LE, LT, GE or GT
Must be entered if APP.APPLI is entered.
This field allows the user to specify which field values are to be used as the selection criteria when deciding whether the parameter condition applies.
Allows alpha-numeric input. Only the following characters will be accepted 'A to Z', 'a to z', '0 to 9', space or '!"#$%&'()*+,-./[\]:;<=>?@^'
35 characters maximum.
Must be entered if APP.APPLI is entered.
